plays.text: Penalty to Ben Clymer 2 minutes for Tripping Jay Pandolfo
Goal scored by Nikita Alexeev assisted by Dan Boyle and Tim Taylor
Penalty to Fredrik Modin 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Scott Niedermayer assisted by Brian Rafalski and Scott Gomez
Penalty to Dave Andreychuk 2 minutes for Hooking Sergei Brylin
Penalty to Sergei Brylin 2 minutes for Diving Dave Andreychuk
Penalty to Janne Laukkanen 2 minutes for Crosschecking Patrik Elias
Penalty to Vaclav Prospal 2 minutes for Slashing Jamie Langenbrunner
Goal scored by Grant Marshall assisted by Scott Niedermayer and Colin White
